SELECT a.EDU_NO, (SELECT CATEGORY3_NAME FROM EDU_CLASS_CATEGORY3 WHERE CATEGORY3_KEY = a.CATEGORY3_KEY) AS CATEGORY3_NAME, a.COPER_NM_AUTO, a.EDU_TARGET, a.EDU_TIME, a.EDU_GARDEN, IFNULL((SELECT SCHEDULE_NO FROM EDU_SCHEDULE WHERE EDU_KEY = a.EDU_NO AND REG_ID = #{UserAccount.user_id}),a.EDU_STATUS) AS EDU_STATUS FROM EDU_REGISTRATION a WHERE EDU_SITE = 'off' AND CATEGORY1_KEY = '7' AND CATEGORY2_KEY = '14' AND EXP_USE_YN = 'Y'
AND COPER_NM_AUTO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND CATEGORY3_KEY IN (SELECT CATEGORY3_KEY FROM EDU_CLASS_CATEGORY3 WHERE CATEGORY3_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%'))
LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EDU_REGISTRATION a WHERE EDU_SITE = 'off' AND CATEGORY1_KEY = '7' AND CATEGORY2_KEY = '14' AND EXP_USE_YN = 'Y'
AND COPER_NM_AUTO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND CATEGORY3_KEY IN (SELECT CATEGORY3_KEY FROM EDU_CLASS_CATEGORY3 WHERE CATEGORY3_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%'))

SELECT ER.EDU_NO, CU.AREA_CD, CONCAT(CU.JUSO,CU.JUSO_DETAIL) AS ADDR ,IFNULL(ER.COPER_NM,ER.COPER_NM_AUTO) AS COPER_NM, (SELECT CATEGORY3_NAME FROM EDU_CLASS_CATEGORY3 WHERE CATEGORY3_KEY = ER.CATEGORY3_KEY) AS CATEGORY3, ER.CATEGORY3_KEY, ER.EDU_TIME, ER.EDU_GARDEN, ER.EDU_TARGET, ER.EDU_TARGET, ER.EDU_STATUS FROM EDU_REGISTRATION ER, COM_USER CU WHERE 1=1 AND ER.EDU_SITE = 'off' AND ER.CATEGORY1_KEY = '7' AND ER.CATEGORY2_KEY = '14' AND ER.EXP_USE_YN = 'Y' AND ER.COPER_ID = CU.USER_ID AND EDU_NO = ${edu_no}

SELECT a.INSTRUCTOR_IDX, (SELECT CD_NM FROM COM_CD_MNG WHERE UP_CD_NO = '32' AND CD = b.AREA_CD) AS AREA_NM, b.USER_NM, b.USER_ID, b.COPER_NM FROM EDU_INSTRUCTOR a, COM_USER b WHERE 1=1 AND a.COM_USER_ID = b.USER_ID AND a.STATUS = 1 AND a.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND b.AREA_CD = ${area_nm}
AND b.USER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ins_nm}, '%')
AND b.COPER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{coper_nm}, '%')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EDU_SCHEDULE a, EDU_SCHEDULE_DETAIL b WHERE a.SCHEDULE_NO = b.SCHEDULE_NO

SELECT a.SCHEDULE_NO,b.USER_ID,b.USER_NM, CASE WHEN b.USER_SEX = 'M' THEN '남' ELSE '여' END AS USER_SEX, (SELECT CD_NM FROM COM_CD_MNG WHERE UP_CD_NO = '32' AND CD = b.AREA_CD) AS AREA_NM, b.INSTRUCTOR_COPER_NM FROM EDU_SCHEDULE_DETAIL a, COM_USER b WHERE a.SCHEDULE_NO = #{sch_no} AND b.USER_ID IN (SELECT INS_USER FROM EDU_SCHEDULE_APP WHERE SCHEDULE_NO = #{sch_no})
mapper.update: UPDATE EDU_SCHEDULE_DETAIL SET CANCEL_DATE = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%x-%m-%d'), CANCEL_REASON = #{cancel_reason}, CANCEL_USER = #{cancel_user}, CANCEL_TEL = #{cancel_tel}, CANCEL_REMARK = #{cancel_remark}, SCH_STATUS = 'C' WHERE SCHEDULE_NO = #{schedule_no}
mapper.select: SELECT a.SCHEDULE_NO, a.EDU_ORG_NAME, b.COPER_ADDR, b.USER_NM, b.USER_TELNO, b.USER_EML, a.EDU_TEAC_NAME, a.EDU_START_DATE, a.EDU_NAME, a.EDU_TARGET, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EDU_COURSE_REGISTRATION WHERE EDU_NO = a.EDU_KEY) AS EDU_NUMBER2, a.EDU_NUMBER, b.EDU_PLACE, a.EDU_KEY FROM EDU_SCHEDULE a, EDU_SCHEDULE_DETAIL b WHERE a.SCHEDULE_NO = b.SCHEDULE_NO AND a.SCHEDULE_NO = ${sch_no}

SELECT a.USER_ID, a.USER_NM, CASE WHEN b.USER_SEX = 'M' THEN '남자' ELSE '여자' END AS USER_SEX, FN_GET_CD_NM1('238', b.JOB_CD) JOB_CD, DATE_FORMAT(b.BIRTH_YMD,'%Y-%m-%d') AS BIRTH_YMD, b.EML_ADDR, b.MBL_TELNO, CONCAT(b.JUSO ,' ', b.JUSO_DETAIL) AS JUSO FROM EDU_COURSE_REGISTRATION a, COM_USER b WHERE a.USER_ID = b.USER_ID AND a.USE_YN IS NULL AND a.EDU_NO = (SELECT EDU_KEY FROM EDU_SCHEDULE WHERE SCHEDULE_NO = ${sch_no})
